description: When a beanie’s too warm and a regular cap isn’t warm enough, enter the Patchwork Ball Cap. This cold weather-ready ball cap, made with a combination of wool fleece and recycled polyester, resists the elements without overheating. Lined with Merino/TENCEL™ Lyocell fabric for better sweat management, odor resistance, and temperature regulation. Plus, the curved brim is made with Bureo NetPlus® material, made of 100% recycled fishing nets.
name: Patchwork Ball Cap
